text: Ioannis Veryvakis (; 3 November 1930 â€“ 19 June 2019) was a Greek Army officer. He rose to the rank of full General and served Chief of the Hellenic National Defence General Staff from 1990 to 1993. He was also Chief of the Hellenic Army General Staff. Veryvakis was born in Edessa. His parents were from Crete. Veryvakis died on 19 June 2019 in Athens, at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Generals Category:Greek people Category:Recipients of the Order of the Legion of Honour Category:Commanders of the Order of the Legion of Honour
title: Ioannis Veryvakis
